scripts.build: emcc -o chip8.html chip8.c -O3 -s WASM=1 --shell-file html_template/template.html -s ASSERTIONS=1 -s USE_SDL=2 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 --embed-file rom/pong.c8 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=["_main","_test_function"] -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["ccall"]
scripts.build-debug: emcc -o chip8.html chip8.c -O1 -s WASM=1 --shell-file html_template/template.html -s ASSERTIONS=1 -s USE_SDL=2 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 --embed-file rom/pong.c8 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=["_main","_test_function"] -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=["ccall"]
